visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts map chart with the following specifications: Chart type: map, Chart title: 'Interactive Map of POIs', Axes and labels styling: Title font size 20px, color #333333, Axes labels font size 14px, color #666666, Data series: One series for 'Basemap Tiles' using OpenStreetMap provider, another series for 'POIs' with a single point at coordinates [6.5811472, 61.08707], Custom colors: Use #2caffe for the button and #000066 for the button highlight, Additional configurations: Enable map navigation, set initial zoom to 13, and center the map at [6.5811472, 61.08707].
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts configuration sets up an interactive map chart with a specific focus on Points of Interest (POIs). The chart type is a map, which is suitable for geographical data visualization. The title of the chart is 'Interactive Map of POIs', styled with a font size of 20px and a color of #333333. The axes labels are styled with a font size of 14px and a color of #666666. The data series includes one series for 'Basemap Tiles' using the OpenStreetMap provider and another series for 'POIs' with a single point located at coordinates [6.5811472, 61.08707]. Custom colors are applied to the button, with #2caffe for the default state and #000066 for the highlighted state. Additional configurations enable map navigation, set the initial zoom level to 13, and center the map at the specified coordinates. This setup ensures a user-friendly and visually appealing map visualization.
